channel.title: actionTimers..., Again

item.title: actionTimers..., Again
item.dc:creator: @jGod jGod
item.description:
@jGod wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:2, topic:249658”] case 4388: // Zamorak Portal if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 600; teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3934; addItem(4515, 1); addItem(4516, 1); sendMessage("You chose Zamorak, Wise Choice!"); teleportToX = 2509; teleportToY = 4689; updateRequired = true; } break;

Maybe something like that.[/quote]

case 4388: // Zamorak Portal if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 600; addItem(4515, 1); addItem(4516, 1); sendMessage("You chose Zamorak, wise choice!"); teleportToX = 2509; teleportToY = 4689; updateRequired = true; } break;

item.title: actionTimers..., Again
item.dc:creator: @David_L_F David_L_F
item.description:
@David_L_F wrote:

Straight to the point, I’m making a ClanWars Minigame. I’m trying to add an actionTimer that teleports you begins once you step in the portal to the minigame, that takes you out after approx. 10 Minutes.

I’ve tried guessing like 22 different times… this is what I came up with.

case 4388: // Zamorak Portal teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3934; addItem(4515, 1); addItem(4516, 1); actionTimer = 600; updateRequired = true; sendMessage("You chose Zamorak, Wise Choice!"); if (actionTimer == 0) { teleportToX = 2509; teleportToY = 4689; updateRequired = true; } break;

I appreciate criticism, just don’t be rude.

Read full topic
